short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu option to summarize links using OpenAI's ChatGPT. Or click the icon to summarize the current page.

long.ar,es,fr,ja,ko:
Summarize current tab and links and solve clickbait using OpenAI's ChatGPT, without needing to open the link.

Summaries generated with ChatGPT by one user are uploaded to a CDN for quick retrieval by other users. So, in most cases, no need to wait for ChatGPT to summarize the article again.

Summarize the current page by clicking the extension icon.

Right-click and click "Summarize Link" to summarize a link.

Ratings system ensures bad quality summaries can be replaced in the CDN.

Reload option allows cached summaries to be re-generated from ChatGPT.

Built-in copy to clipboard option.

Moveable window to avoid covering page content.

Currently only English supported but support for other languages coming soon.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Summarize current tab and links and solve clickbait using OpenAI's ChatGPT, without needing to open the link.

Summaries generated with ChatGPT by one user are uploaded to a CDN for quick retrieval by other users. So, in most cases, no need to wait for ChatGPT to summarize the article again.

Summarize the current page by clicking the extension icon.

Right-click and click "Summarize Link" to summarize a link.

Ratings system ensures bad quality summaries can be replaced in the CDN.

Reload option allows cached summaries to be re-generated from ChatGPT.

Built-in copy to clipboard option.

Moveable window to avoid covering page content.

New in version 1.1.0: Multi-language summary generation added for 53 languages. Summaries are generated in the browsers language and are cached separately for each language.

New in version 1.2.0: Performance improvements. Fix issue where summaries are not generated in the correct language. Fix issue where options are not reloaded when reset.

New version 1.2.1: Check Quality of Summary before caching. Name change.
